channel.title: [pi] how do i make an npc tele me [pi]
channel.description: i need to make the first click on an npc tele you :l um i tryed putting it into npcpy.1 but i dont know the coding to make that work or even if thats the right place.

item.title: [pi] how do i make an npc tele me [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Krillgj, post:6, topic:385000”][quote author=EMINEM BEAST™ link=topic=480767.msg3520074#msg3520074 date=1299348377]
in Actionhandler add this:

case ####: c.getPA().movePlayer(####, ####, 0); break
Just add the npc id and the coords.
[/quote]

Where do i put the things? it could be very useful for my server :P[/quote]
Really?

[b]in [size=18pt]Actionhandler [/size]add this:[/b]

item.title: [pi] how do i make an npc tele me [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=480767.msg3520093#msg3520093 date=1299349494]

in Actionhandler add this:

case ####: c.getPA().movePlayer(####, ####, 0); break
Just add the npc id and the coords.

I thought ActionHandler handled button clicks o.o
[/quote]ActionHandler handles clicking on npcs/objects. ClickingButtons handles buttons.[/quote]
Oh nvm then got mixed up between both.

Read full topic
